description: A police officer appeared to give a Nazi salute while the Slovak man was pinned down on a bed.
title: Calls for new inquiry into Belgian police custody death
title_page: Calls for new inquiry into Belgian police custody death - BBC News
maintext: "Something seemed to be going on with my husband, he wasn't feeling well, but the police ignored my husband all night," said Mrs Chovancova. "When they saw the blood, they should have given him first aid. Instead, they sat on him with so many people. He couldn't breathe properly."
